alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 10:52PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Nassau and northern Duval Counties through 1130 PM EDT... At 1052 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ratliff, or near Callahan, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Yulee, Nassau Village-Ratliff, Ratliff, Oceanway and Little Talbot Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
